content:
Play at the start of your turn.

Until the end of your turn, you gain the benefits of greater cover after taking the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Hide] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Sneak] action, allowing you to Hide or Sneak in the open. This effect ends if you do anything other than Hide, Sneak, or Step.
name: Opportune Distraction
